title: The ultimate SaaS boilerplate | Saas-Boilerplate.dev | SaaS-Boilerplate.dev
creator: Tanay Karnik
main_features: Magic Links and Social Sign In

tech_stack_table.Description: A framework for building server-rendered Vue.js applications.
A typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript.
An ORM for Node.js and TypeScript.
Amazon Web Services, a cloud computing platform.
A web performance and security company.
A platform for frontend frameworks and static sites.
A C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database.

emoji_with_features: 🛠️ Modular Architecture, 👨‍💻 Developer Experience, 📜 TypeScript, 💳 Stripe and Paddle Payments, 🚀 Production Ready, 🏗️ Infrastructure as Code (IaC), 🤖 AI Demos, 🔄 CI/CD and Automated Testing, ☁️ Deploy to AWS/Cloudflare/Vercel/Hetzner, 🔒 No Vendor Lock-In, 🗄️ SQLite/D1/PostgresSQL, ⏳ Async Jobs, 🛠️ Prisma ORM, 📧 Emails, 🔑 Magic Links and Social Sign In, 🛡️ Enterprise-Grade RBAC, 👥 Team Management and Invites, 💰 Billing and Subscriptions, 🎨 Beautiful UI, 📈 SEO Optimized, 🌍 Internationalization
